name: Taketh or Leaveth
description:
Taketh or Leaveth your powers.

Game jam game developed in 3 days so there might be bugs, sorry.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move, E key to interact, Tab key to view current power

Developed by:

Sebastian Mol, Daniil Sheshtanov, Elliott Desouza, Keron Sepp and Toby Wishart.
